name: Dev Null Producer
helpText: Ending component of the flow, or a route in the flow. This type of producer discards all data passed to it and does not perform any processing.
_ikasanComponentFactoryMethod: The broker is a user implemented class so has no factory as such

Name.helpText: The name of the component as displayed on diagrams, space are encouraged, succinct is best. The name should be unique for the flow.

Description.helpText: A more detailed description of the component that may assist in support..
